name: Reducto
headline: The most accurate way to parse complex documents
description: Reducto offers robust and reliable document ingestion for any workflow. Our API allows you to convert complex, unstructured documents into structured outputs that are perfect for RAG, process automation, and more.

founders.name: Adit Abraham, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder/CEO at Reducto. Before Reducto I studied CS at MIT, made Ads/Search things as a PM for Google, did ML research at MIT's Media Lab, and spent an unreasonable amount of time playing Pokemon Showdown.

founders.name: Raunak Chowdhuri, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder/CTO at Reducto. Before Reducto I studied CS at MIT, founded/scaled a comp. chem consulting company to 200k ARR, published computer vision papers with 100+ citations before finishing high school, and spent a little too much time shit posting on Twitter.

[![Reducto](https://reducto.ai/Logomark_purple.svg)![Reducto](https://reducto.ai/Logo_color_purple.svg)](https://reducto.ai/</>)
[Pricing](https://reducto.ai/</pricing>)[Documentation](https://reducto.ai/<https:/docs.reducto.ai>)[Blog](https://reducto.ai/</blog>)[Careers](https://reducto.ai/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/reducto/jobs>)[Get Started](https://reducto.ai/</pricing>)
[Get Started](https://reducto.ai/</pricing>)
# High Quality Data Ingestion for LLMs
Reducto parses complex documents and creates LLM-ready inputs with unparalleled accuracy.
[Try our demo](https://reducto.ai/<https:/app.reducto.ai/share/16a76358-a2cd-41ba-9f21-4e3755c98211>)[Get started now](https://reducto.ai/</pricing>)
A team from world class institutions
![Y Combinator](https://reducto.ai/flex/yc.svg)![NVIDIA](https://reducto.ai/flex/nvidia.svg)![MIT](https://reducto.ai/flex/mit.svg)![Google](https://reducto.ai/flex/google.svg)
### High accuracy across complex layouts
Our models read documents the way humans do.
That means unrivaled accuracy across all of your tables, forms, images, graphs, and more.
### LLM-ready inputs for any use case
We optimize each document's outputs so you don't have to.
Reducto takes care of everything from interpreting graphs to intelligently chunking content, ensuring perfect inputs for your pipeline.
### Structured data from unstructured sources
Turn unstructured documents into useful insights with Reducto.
Our API empowers you to define custom schemas, enabling precise extraction of the content that matters most to your business.
### Uncompromising security
Every document is processed with industry leading security practices.
We offer zero data retention via our hosted API, and also allow you to self host our models in your cloud or on-prem.
Reliable ExtractionPowerful PostprocessingCustom SchemasFully Secure
### High accuracy across complex layouts
Our models read documents the way humans do.
That means unrivaled accuracy across all of your tables, forms, images, graphs, and more.
## Built for your legal contracts
FINANCE
INSURANCE
![Legal illustration](https://reducto.ai/_next/image?url=%2Findustry%2Flegal.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
### Reducto for Legal
Enhance legal document analysis with Reducto. Our AI quickly processes and extracts crucial information from contracts, court documents, and legal correspondence.
HEALTHCARE
## Your new ingestion team
Find out why leading startups and Fortune 10 enterprises trust Reducto to accurately ingest unstructured data.
Book a Demo

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Reducto**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Winter 2024 batch, Reducto aims to change the way we handle complex documents. Their mission? To provide the most accurate method for parsing these documents, transforming unstructured data into structured outputs that fit seamlessly into workflows for applications like RAG (retrieval-augmented generation) and process automation. Located in an unspecified area, Reducto comprises a tight-knit team of 8 employees, guided by the expertise of Group Partner Diana Hu.

**What They Do**

At its core, Reducto offers an advanced API designed for robust document ingestion. The service stands out in its ability to convert complex layouts—including tables, forms, and graphs—into LLM (large language model)-ready inputs. This capability guarantees high accuracy, mimicking how humans read and interpret documents. With an emphasis on versatility, Reducto allows custom schema definitions, enabling businesses to extract precisely what they need from their documents.

**Security and Reliability**

Security is a pillar of Reducto’s operations. They adhere to top-notch security practices and provide options for zero data retention via their hosted API. Users also have the flexibility to self-host their models on personal cloud or on-premise solutions, giving them full control.

**Use Cases and Industries**

Reducto's technology is particularly beneficial for sectors such as:

- **Legal**: Enhancing the analysis and processing of legal documents like contracts and court filings.
- **Healthcare**: Supporting the extraction of key information from medical records.
- **Finance**: Streamlining financial document management.
- **Insurance**: Improving claims processing and policy assessments.

**Current Highlights and Future Directions**

Recently, Reducto announced RD-TableBench, a comprehensive benchmark for PDF table parsing, showcasing their commitment to continuous improvement and innovation. 

For those interested in exploring Reducto's offerings, they provide a demo and thorough documentation on their website. The platform is not just about technology; it’s about creating high-quality data ingestion processes that make life easier for businesses navigating the complexities of document management.

**Website**: [Reducto](https://reducto.ai)

In a world where data accuracy and security are paramount, Reducto is positioning itself as a reliable partner for enterprises looking to optimize their document handling processes. If you’re dealing with complex documents, their solution could be a game changer.
